data.eml:eml: A taxonomic catalog, including host and geographic distribution, of the species of the genus Gyropus Nitzsch (Phthiraptera: Amblycera: Gyropidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Valim, Michel P., Linardi, Pedro Marcos (2008): A taxonomic catalog, including host and geographic distribution, of the species of the genus Gyropus Nitzsch (Phthiraptera: Amblycera: Gyropidae). Zootaxa 1899: 1-24, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.274532
